Reference

All functions

add_scorerWeights_to_criteriaTree()

Add weights of a scorer to criteria tree

add_weights()

Add weights to a data frame for weighed estimates

add_weights_to_criteriaTree()

Add weights to criteria tree

aggregate_estimates_by_criterion()

Aggregate estimates by criterion

aggregate_estimates_by_criterionCluster()

Aggregate estimates by criterion clusters (parent criteria)

aggregate_estimates_by_decision()

Aggregate the (potentially weighed) estimates by decision

build_weighed_estimate_df()

Build a dataframe for weighed estimates

cat0()

Concatenate to screen without spaces

combine_weights_and_criteria()

Add weights from a data frame to criteria tree and update data frame

create_labelDf()

Create data frame with identifiers and labels

get_alternativeLabel()

Get the alternative labels based on a data frame

insert_if_knitting_to_html()

Insert text only if knitting to HTML

insert_if_knitting_to_pdf()

Insert text only if knitting to pdf

opts

Options for the mdmcda package

performanceTable_heatmap()

Create a performance table heatmap

plot_criteria()

Produce a DiagrammeR plot and show it and/or convert to SVG

read_criteria_from_xl()

Read the criteria from a spreadsheet

read_estimates_from_xl()

Load estimates from an Excel file

read_labels_from_xl() read_criterionLabels_from_xl() read_decisionLabels_from_xl() read_scenarioLabels_from_xl() read_alternativeLabels_from_xl()

Read labels from an Excel file

read_scenarioDefinitions_from_xl()

Import scenario definitions

read_scenarioDefinitions_in_columns_from_xl()

Import scenario definitions defined in columns

repeatStr()

Repeat a string a number of times

scenario_overview()

Create an object with various useful data frames and plots for a scenario

scoreBarchart_criteria()

Create a bar chart with scores per criterion

scoreBarchart_criteriaCluster()

Create a bar chart with scores per criteria cluster

scoreBarchart_decisions()

Create a bar chart with scores per decision

scoreBarchart_scenariosByCluster()

Create a bar chart with scores per criteria cluster per scenario

set_postsets()

Set postsets

vecTxt() vecTxtQ()

Easily parse a vector into a character value

weigh_estimates_by_profile()

Weigh estimates by one or more weight profiles

weigh_multiEstimateDf()

Weigh estimates in a multiEstimateDf

write_labels_to_xl() write_criterionLabels_to_xl() write_decisionLabels_to_xl() write_scenarioLabels_to_xl() write_alternativeLabels_to_xl()

Write labels to an Excel file

write_scenarioDefinitions_to_xl()

Write scenario definitions to an Excel spreadsheet

write_weightProfile_to_xl()

Write weight profiles to an Excel spreadsheet
